foldocml
Class SearchPenalty

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--foldocml.PenaltyFunc
        |
        +--foldocml.SearchPenalty
Direct Known Subclasses:
AveragedSearchPenalty, NormalisedSearchPenalty
public class SearchPenalty
extends PenaltyFunc

A Penalty function that uses the original ontology to determine 'closeness' of any node not in one of the graphs being compared to the other graph

The base class simply uses the shortest path in the ontology

Version:
0.4
Author:
Trent Apted
See Also:
Connection.ratioSimilar2(HashGraph g1, HashGraph g2, PrintStream log)
